title: The Lumineers - Performance & Interview (Live on KEXP at Home)
description:
http://KEXP.ORG presents The Lumineers sharing a live performance recorded exclusively for KEXP and talking to John Richards, host of The Morning Show. Recorded January 12, 2022.

Songs:
Brightside
A.M. Radio
Where We Are
Just Like Heaven
Ophelia

Performed by The Lumineers: Wesley Schultz & Jeremiah Fraites 
Production: Framework Productions
Director/Cinematographer: Steven Pierce
Producer: James Allerdyce
Camera Operators: Salvatore D'Alia, Brian Dieck, Jason Markowitz, James Allerdyce
Production Crew: Bret Carr, Ryan Guess, Matt Mundy
Tour/Production Manager: Sara Full
Assistant Tour Manager: Anthony Hook
Guitar Tech: Shawn Lobb 
Sound Engineer: Steven Sacco
Mixed by David Baron

https://www.thelumineers.com
http://kexp.org
